mapper.select: select a.id, a.address_no, a.`name`, a.data_id, a.pixel_length, a.pixel_wide, a.remark, a.create_time, b.`name` as pname, b.path, b.suffix from advert a JOIN dhlk_basic_attachment b ON (a.data_id=b.data_id) where is_delete = 0 and a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into dhlk_subcontract_plat.advert(address_no, `name`, data_id, pixel_length, pixel_wide, remark, create_time, is_delete) values (#{addressNo}, #{name}, #{dataId}, #{pixelLength}, #{pixelWide}, #{remark}, now(), 0)
mapper.update:
update dhlk_subcontract_plat.advert
address_no = #{addressNo},
name = #{name},
data_id = #{dataId},
pixel_length = #{pixelLength},
pixel_wide = #{pixelWide},
remark = #{remark},
create_time = #{createTime},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update dhlk_subcontract_plat.advert set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id}
